main event: Multiple witnesses observed a bright, elongated, cigar-shaped object moving erratically in the sky on July 22, 1962.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 500 to 600 yards in diameter,It hovered for five minutes before moving at high speed,The sighting was made by reputable individuals, including a retired mechanic,The object made an occasional humming sound,The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes before the object shot straight up out of sight.
witness description: a retired mechanic and two businessmen
